Usage: ./bin/survey-tool [options]

Specific options:
    -q FILEPATH,                     The FILEPATH of the questions file.
        --questions-filepath
    -r FILEPATH,                     The FILEPATH of the responses file. Defaults to <questions-filepath>-responses.csv
        --responses-filepath

Common options:
    -h, --help                       Show this message
    -v, --version                    Show version
